title: Merckx Clarifies Who Is the GOAT: ‘I Don’t Think Pogačar Is Superior to Me. He Has a Long Way to Be Better’
content:
Belgian Hall of Famer reels back comments that 'Pogačar is now above me' as Slovenian prepares to debut rainbow jersey this weekend in Emilia.

Read the full article at Merckx Clarifies Who Is the GOAT: ‘I Don’t Think Pogačar Is Superior to Me. He Has a Long Way to Be Better’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
